# Getting Started

## Installing and loading packages

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, tidymodels)
```

## Importing Data

```{r}
exam <- read_csv("data\\Exam_data.csv")
```

## Exploratory Data Analysis

```{r}
ggplot(data = exam,
       aes(x=GENDER, y = MATHS)) +
  geom_boxplot() + 
  ylab("Math Scores") #or labs(y = "Math Scores")
```

## Summary Statistics

```{r}
summary(exam)
```

```{r}
str(exam)
```
